comments.comment: I can't wait until me and felix are 60 still cringing at new content creators.

"Bandicam? Who uses Bandicam still these days?"
"How do you see it?"
Perfect, Pewds, just perfect

I fuckin love how 15 year old critikal is literally the same dude , like they said everyone was trying to be the best and critikal was just like "yea heres me sucking at this game...whatever" perfect content he was ahead of his time

Ken: Who uses Bandicam these days?

Felix: (Nervously sweating)
The fact that Charlie’s voice didn’t change a bit until now is a bit disturbing yet so cool being a monotone all the time.

I swear Charlie was ahead of his time, like they said, everyone wanted to be good and make montages etc, but it made me actually chuckle to see Charlie just roast his own gameplay. And he has had that sense of humor to this day I feel, he just has that something.
Maybe that first PewDiePie video is sitting on a hard drive somewhere, waiting to be rediscovered

YouTube communities were a lot smaller back in the day, there was something really special and personal about them. I think lower production standards made it feel really personal too, just watching someone record videos in their bedroom or something was really cool for some reason.
Ken and Felix together have such a good dynamic. feels like hanging with the boys. love it.
I love how Ken Happily says he was at university meanwhile Felix spiraling in depression, dropping out and forcefully selling hotdogs in front of the school he dropped out

Ken: lives in Australia for like a year…

Grows mullet.
It’s an actual VIBE.
I love how Charlie so clearly was and still is himself. No persona needed.
friendship transcends time, its truly wholesome seeing these 2 together for so long
This brings me back to being a 13 year old in 2009 and growing up with YouTube, it was so fun.
I love how Charlie just hasn't changed at all, favorite thing about him. He's so funny and solid. This video was wholesome.
I'm convinced Charlie's voice sounded like that ever since he was born.

Everytime I take a break and then come back to watching pewdiepie, I remember why I liked him in the first place. Been a bro since 2013/14 and still am.

Edit: super cliché to edit and say "omg 7.9k likes?!?!?!" But like zamn. I'm glad so many people have the same sentiment
Alternate title: Pewdiepie and Ken realize how old they've become
I love being able to hear Felix talk about his past and go "Yup, I remember that. I was there for all of that." Feels good.
This feels like two veterans telling their beautiful stories to the new generation and l love it.
2008: "Pewdiepie was selling hot dogs. Wow! A man of the people." LMFAO 1:55

Everyone : feels cringe when looking at their old videos

Pewdiepie : I like that guy

I was watching Ken and Pewds while I was in college around 2011-2015  I got my first internship doing business analytics and learning about S.A.P for the South Florida water management district around 2015 in February.  My coworkers must've thought I was nuts because I'd always be laughing at a video from one of these guys with a headphone in my ear.  I also used to listen to Sleepycast alot those years.  I'm a 30 year old little old man living in California now, with my wife who was a project manager at the Florida  water district.  To me in 2010 when I graduated high-school, it still feels like that was yesterday.  It makes me extremely happy looking back on those years.  Moving out of my parent's house in 2011 felt like such a scary huge step that I didn't feel prepared for.  I know it's kinda pathetic but I had no friends back then since I wasn't into the party scene and drinking.  So I felt like some of you guys on YouTube were my buddies I'd check in on every now and then.  So much has changed throughout the years and it's been one hell of a ride getting here today.
Been watching pewds and Charlie for legit YEARS. Never thought they would get soooo big. Just makes me smile
22:29 That Ken first sketch was amazing to be honest. It’s way better than the sh*t we see on TikTok nowadays

I may have not realized it, but back in the 2012+ era, Felix really got me through some shit, man. For being there back then, I'll always support whatever he does. Even if I don't have time to watch Pewds videos anymore. 
I'll see to keep an eye on newer videos.
Ken mentioning people dozing off to him compared to MrBeast. I love how calm he is in his videos. He has no ideas how many drunk, dizzy nights his calm voice has gotten me through
Fun fact, 9 out of 10 first videos from these Youtubers would be instantly demonetized if they were posted today.
He has come such a long way. So proud being part of this journey. Felix for president.

These are my most favorite videos ever. Where Pewds and Ken just shoot the   and have a nostalgic look back. It makes you feel like you were there with them, 'cause for some of us we are around the same age and have been subbed since the beginning. It's a little cathartic even. Love to see how they've grown and reflect on how I have as well.

"God we've been through a lot man"
AWWWWWW ♡
Happy to see you and Ken enjoy some friendly time together Felix! I hope you're loving your life in Japan! I hope Marzia and Edgar are doing well aswell!
YouTube made it extremely difficult to watch old videos. They removed the “sort by oldest” at least on the iOS app.
Felix and Ken feels like an old married couple at this point
Watching you play amnesia was the best because of the no edits just raw footage of you genuinely getting scared or getting confused or running in circles I loved it

There's a lot of secondhand embarrassment watching these, but I also think it's so wholesome to see how everyone started. Classic YouTube had a lot of big personalities finding their feet, and it's so sweet to see everyone grow up. But also kids are yikes lol I'm torn in half between cringe and endearment

Ken I don't think yours was that bad minus the editing. Back then I wanted to watch people with minimal talking in lets plays then see their personality in sketches. We all evolve so nothing to be ashamed of! Felix also wasn't bad either! Obviously you both way better now. Haha

100 year old Pewdiepie talking about future YouTube:
"You wippersnappers take everything you have for granted. When I started YouTube, we had annotations blocking the screen and had to make the thumbnail part of the end of the video."
Friday with Pewdiepie was my favorite growing up , I looked forward to each time !!
I feel that I watched Pewds and CinamonToastKen reacting to YouTubers first videos at least once a year, but still feels fresh every time

I don't know why but this got me a little bit emotional, like damn was it that long ago? I still remember that personalized YouTube channels back then, with Pewd's full black and red highlights and the Amnesia Grunt
This is just Ken and pewds going “back in my day-“ and I’m all for it
Friday’s with pewdiepie will forever be my favorite  and the animations that would come out from his gameplay.
These are two perfect people with same humour and personalities. I love that they just match perfectly, it's so fun to watch them two. I hope they're gonna be friends till the end.
That moment when Ken accidentally called out Felix on using Bandicam  I am literally in tears, Felix's reaction is priceless

This is more or less how I got introduced to both Ken and Felix, I remember crying over some breakup I had in high school and watching YouTube to take my mind off of it. I stumbled across PewDiePie's channel and was laughing hysterically watching his amnesia videos and  happy wheels videos. I discovered Ken soon after and quickly subscribed. Got me through a lot of high school depression with laughter ️️️️ So much love for the both of you, feel like old high school friends haha
18:35 the way Ken got jumpscared by his own channel
I still rewatch Felix's old amnesia videos.Still love it I remember watching you and Jack daily at the start....god it's been long
17:26 is the most pure felix laugh i have seen in an long time.
Back when there was nothing like demonitization, money or copyright strikes. People just made yt videos for fun.
I wish more people kept their early content public. Looking back at a creator's roots is such fun.
4:53 lmao, pewds eyeroll is so hilarious
Pewds should be a brand ambassador for Bandicam at this point. He's like the genuine costumer for years.
4:55 he really just exposed himself unintentionally that he still uses bandicam lmao
When you realize PewDiePie and Ken were so baby faces in the beginning
Time flies, I've been watching this guy for almost 10 years now. Those vids in the beginning rly bring back some nostalgia.
I really do feel old now started watching Pewds when I was 12, now here I am 22 with still no idea what I’m doing

This really takes me back when I first started watching pewds during his amnesia playtrough, and getting stuck at the puzzles, still watched it though. Been a bro since 2011/2012 and still a regular viewer to this day. Getting reminded why I like watching his videos with this one in particular
the video they used to introduce KSI at 10:00 caught me off guard so hard lmao

This is so wholesome! You and Marzia will always be such a huge part of my childhood! Every night I would watch you both so I wouldn’t feel so alone. I thank you for everything and for all the laughs! Brofist

Gosh, I remember watching you and Ken since 2014  as a kid (Back when you were "king of youtube" in the book of records haha) and I still do to this day as an adult, good times. Glad you're both still around, always make my day

I LOVE looking back at my old, cringy stuff. I keep all my old drawings. Both physically and on places like DeviantArt. I still have all my old animations up.

I think it’s cool to see how much you’ve improved and where you came from. I don’t get those that delete everything from their past.
Ken baiting Pewds on that Bandicam was flawless lmao
I miss old YouTube it was 1 of the best times!

Damn
Every time I see your old videos, it really makes me happy that I am a part of your journey. It really feels like I'm growing up with you.
I really love how wholesome this video is, it's always nice to look back/ talk about how old youtube was and how different the content was then vs now.

I guess Felix is a fan of Dune. I remember he also personally attended the premiere of Ender's Game. It's interesting to know he loves this kind of stuff, High quality scifi literature or at least their film adaptations.
Man I get the same feeling watching this that I do going over old stories with buddies, gonna be tough when these days are over, appreciate you and all the memories Felix
The Reason why a guy like MrBeast works was straight algorithm. Him saying "HEY GUYS! BLAH BLAH BLAH" Was algorithm friendly along with the daily uploads and eventually BOOM.
1:33 1:33 1:33 - The duality of Ken having a crisis asking how old he is with Pewds quieter asking how young Logan is in sync with eachother is ending me
26:30 Even back then, Pewds was already FLOOR GANG

I still remember being so bored when I watched pewdiepie try and do a pipe puzzle near the end of Amnesia. 10 minutes of my life spent, sweating under the covers at 2am on a summer school night, just hoping he'll finally get it done
I can’t wait for Felix to become a full on dad and kens children and his play and they just go “back in my day”
Love u pewds been watching u for 7 years now, you have grown so much, your videos helped me through a lot and I just wanna say thank you, keep it up pewds

I'm 32, and I would watch PewDiePie in my college years. I remember all those fun times. lol But you made horror games so fun, when I was to scared to play them myself. Happy to still be watching your videos!   :)
23:35 thats not pewdie thats shaggy

I remember I was subscribed to pewds since 2011. Watching his penumbra and amnesia as well as his Friday's with pewdiepie. Just haven't been around long when him and marzia first got together. So much memories
If I remember correctly, when Pewds were building Sven's japanese house, he told a story about his first video EVER. He said that he tried looking for it but he couldn't find it.

25:40

I remember watching this suddenly appear in my feed and a few days layer pewds shows himself bymistakely making it unprivate and then gets shocked by how much views it got at that instance and was like ok ill keep it there
It's always so motivating to see bigger Creator's older videos, and then see where they are now. Especially if you've watched them over the years and see how they've grown.
I love the 2021 Pewdiepie videos with Ken but the vlog videos stole my heart. But I still love these tiny lil interludes in between the vlog videos. I enjoy this man

Going back to the old videos makes me miss those times, especially Cryaotic, even with the bad stuff he did I can't refute the great times I had bouncing between Cry, Ken, Pewds, and Markiplier . For me I thrived and grew up on watching Pewdiepie, Cryaotic, Markiplier, and Ken, I miss those times of Amnesia and non stop horror games. Now horror games just don't hit the same.

As someone who's watched Cr1TiKaL since I first got internet in 2012, I can say his old content is AMAZING. Monotone but hilarious dry humor that got me through middle school back in the day. He uploaded gameplay where he messed up, played horror games with NO reaction to the jumpscares (which was really impressive to me, since I was still scared of horror back then, and I thought he was superhuman, which honestly he is), basically did everything the opposite of what trendy youtubers were doing, and it was still great. I was always scared that a "face reveal" or a "change in style" would ruin it, but he's done both and I still love his content to this day.

P.S. Felix, I'm watching this on an overheating HP Pavilion. It's not burning my leg, though, so I'm not living the true HP experience.
You know it's a fun video when ken and pewds make a video together.
2:24 Exactly what I'd expect to see from his first video.
Pewdiepie is such a legend, I've watched him since I was 7 years old and now I'm 15. Pewdiepie has been in more than half of my life and I will keep watching his great content.
Ken doesn’t give himself enough credit, makes me so sad watching him tear himself down

13:18

"Wait a minute. This whole operation was your idea"


"You've become the very thing you swore to destroy"
It's been years since I watched a video with Ken. Was good to watch a nostalgic video with you 2. Hard to believe how much it changed over the years

I was shocked to come back to pewdiepie and see him and ken still consistently making videos together. Not that I thought they had bad blood but a lot of freindships naturally fade over time. It's great to watch them like I used to when I was small!
i feel like it's so wholesome how some of long date pewds friends came from these contests he ran in the beginning on his channel (like cinnammontoastken, jacksepticeye, etc etc). kinda sweet <3
Just hearing Ken’s reaction to getting to watch YouTubers’ first videos is already amazing
But I miss the old YouTube. Those were the real creative content days
Just realised that everything in Ken's camera is mirrored and seeing a backwards keyboard will now keep me up at night

My opinion with Felix using Bandicam is that if it works for him, there is no need to start blank with a completely different software. Also, I like the thought of people still showing support for old software.

I would drop current Youtube for pre 2009 Youtube instantly. Its so hard to "discover" new shit you dont know about today because if you dont search, you dont find what their shit algorithm pushes to you and how the fuck are you supposed to search for something you dont even know exists.
Broken podcast needs a reboot, you two are just too wholesome together! I've loved watching you both over the years but damn you really made me feel old watching this
Crazy that I’m in my tenth year of watching pewdiepie. I’m 21 now, grew up with him and his content lol
i can’t wait to tell my future grandkids of the story of grandpa ken and felix
Charlie's voice has barely changed, and I love him for that.
